data.title: The Unofficial Elder Scrolls Pages (UESP)
data.text:
DLC Game Packs are individual content packs for Elder Scrolls Online. Following the release of Tamriel Unlimited, all future content updates will be released as DLC, while base game features, bug fixes, and other "quality of life" updates will accompany the DLC release as a free base game patch. The term 'DLC' is a misnomer, as all players download the DLC game packs and can even trade for certain DLC-specific items. DLC can be bought permanently from the in-game Crown Store; alternatively, ESO Plus members are given access to all DLC for the duration of their subscription. No progress is lost should you cancel ESO Plus without first purchasing the DLC, and all items and skills earned will remain accessible.

Loyalty Rewards can be obtained by accessing DLC either through the Crown Store or through ESO Plus. Accessible DLC appears in the Collections tab, separate from regular Collectibles. The introductory quest for each DLC can be received through this menu, although doing so is optional, as the quests can also be received naturally through regular gameplay.

Necrom is considered a "Chapter" rather than a DLC. Chapters are not available via ESO Plus or the Crown Store and are therefore not listed here. Morrowind, Summerset, Elsweyr, Greymoor, Blackwood, and High Isle were previously only available as Chapters, but they have since been made available in the Crown Store as DLC with the release of the following Chapter.

DLC Bundles

Guilds and Glory

Get the first four Tamriel Unlimited DLC packs for one bargain price! Treat yourself to a broad array of new content for every play style.

Guilds and Glory: The 4-DLC Mega-Pack is the first DLC bundle for ESO. Coinciding with the retail launch of the Gold Edition, the bundle contains the four DLC game packs:

Imperial City

Orsinium

Thieves Guild

Dark Brotherhood

It was released on September 9, 2016 in the Crown Store for 055005,500 , and was reduced to 040004,000 when Imperial City became free in September 2019.

Year Two Mega-Pack: DLC Bundle

Get the year two mega-pack of ESO DLC for one bargain price! Treat yourself to a broad array of new content for every play style.

The Year Two Mega-Pack: DLC Bundle is available in the Crown Store on all platforms for 3,500, as of June 21, 2021 at 10 am EDT.

Contents:

Clockwork City

Horns of the Reach

Shadows of the Hist

Year Three Mega-Pack: DLC Bundle

Get the year three mega-pack of ESO DLC for one bargain price! Treat yourself to a broad array of new content for every play style.

The Year Three Mega-Pack: DLC Bundle is available in the Crown Store on all platforms for 3,500, as of July 18, 2022 at 10am EDT.

Contents:

Dragon Bones

Wolfhunter

Murkmire

Season of the Dragon: DLC Bundle

Get the Season of the Dragon mega-pack of ESO DLC for one bargain price! Treat yourself to a broad array of new content for every play style.

The Season of the Dragon: DLC Bundle is available in the Crown Store on all platforms for 3,500, as of July 22, 2021 at 10am EDT.

Contents:

Wrathstone

Scalebreaker

Dragonhold

Dark Heart of Skyrim: DLC Bundle

Get the Dark Heart of Skyrim mega-pack of ESO DLC for one bargain price! Treat yourself to a broad array of new content for every play style.

The Dark Heart of Skyrim: DLC Bundle is available in the Crown Store on all platforms for 3,500, as of November 17, 2022 at 10am EDT.

Contents:

Harrowstorm

Stonethorn

Markarth

Gates of Oblivion: DLC Bundle

Get the Gates of Oblivion mega-pack of ESO DLC for one bargain price! Treat yourself to a broad array of new content for every play style.

The Gates of Oblivion: DLC Bundle is available in the Crown Store on all platforms for 3,500, as of December 19, 2022 at 10am EST.

Contents:

Flames of Ambition

Waking Flame

The Deadlands

DLC

DLC Crowns Story Zone Instanced Content Features Description Release Date Guilds and Glory Imperial City Free Imperial City Dungeons: White-Gold Tower, Imperial City Prison Daedric forces have taken the Imperial City, and all three alliances vie to take it back. Experience hours of all-new PvP and PvE gameplay, both above ground and below, plus two new dungeons, never-before-seen monsters, craftable item sets, and more! PC/Mac: August 31, 2015

Xbox One: September 15, 2015

PS4: September 16, 2015 Orsinium 3,000 Wrothgar Arena: Maelstrom Arena(solo) Come to the homeland of the Orc in Tamriel Unlimited's first new PvE quest content DLC! Help King Kurog rebuild the city of Orsinium, and watch its walls and towers rise due to your deeds. Includes new armor, weapons, a solo challenge arena, and more! PC/Mac: November 2, 2015

Xbox One: November 17, 2015

PS4: November 18, 2015 Thieves Guild 2,000 Hew's Bane Trial: Maw of Lorkhaj Faction: Thieves Guild Come to Hew's Bane in Hammerfell and join the notorious Thieves Guild! Master the new criminal skills in this DLC and help restore the Guild to prominence. And that's just the start! PC/Mac: March 7, 2016

Xbox One: March 22, 2016

PS4: March 23, 2016 Dark Brotherhood 2,000 Gold Coast Faction: Dark Brotherhood Your talent for homicide has been noticed, and the invitation has arrived - to join the Dark Brotherhood! Come now to the Gold Coast, westernmost region of the old Empire, where you'll find opportunity, intrigue... and murder! It's one killer DLC. PC/Mac: May 31, 2016

Xbox One: June 14, 2016

PS4: June 15, 2016 Story arc: Daedric War/Year Two Shadows of the Hist 1,500 Dungeons: Cradle of Shadows, Ruins of Mazzatun Includes two new Argonian dungeons: Cradle of Shadows and The Ruins of Mazzatun! PC/Mac: August 1, 2016

Console: August 16, 2016 Morrowind Free Vvardenfell Trial: Halls of Fabrication Class: Warden Morrowind is on the verge of destruction and only you can save it from a deadly Daedric threat. Discover the secrets of the island of Vvardenfell, and help the Dark Elves stop a meteor from crashing into Vivec City. As Chapter: June 6, 2017

As DLC: June 5, 2018 Horns of the Reach 1,500 Dungeons: Bloodroot Forge, Falkreath Hold The Dreadhorn clan of Reachmen are up to no good in southwest Skyrim, and it's up to you to foil their plots in the dungeons of Bloodroot Forge and Falkreath Hold. PC/Mac: August 14, 2017

Console: August 29, 2017 Clockwork City 2,000 Clockwork City Trial: Asylum Sanctorium Transmute Station Enter the mechanical world of the Clockwork City and explore Sotha Sil's greatest creation. PC/Mac: October 23, 2017

Console: November 11, 2017 Story arc: Daedric War/Year Three Dragon Bones 1,500 Dungeons: Fang Lair, Scalecaller Peak Cultists conspire to unleash a plague, while Necromancers attempt to reawaken a Bone Dragon. Put an end to these threats in the all-new Fang Lair and Scalecaller Dungeons. PC/Mac: February 12, 2018

Console: February 27, 2018 Summerset 3,500 Summerset

Artaeum Trial: Cloudrest

Jewelry Crafting By royal decree, the once-forbidden island of the High Elves has been opened, its Crystal Tower drawing travelers to its light. But dark forces from beyond and below are also interested in the mystic location in this new adventure set in Summerset Isle. As Chapter: June 5, 2018

As DLC: June 4, 2019 Wolfhunter 1,500 Dungeons: March of Sacrifices, Moon Hunter Keep Dive into all-new stories themed around Tamriel's werewolves and the Daedric Prince Hircine. Two dungeons, two very different environments filled with hordes of monsters, tricky boss encounters, and unique rewards for heroes who accept the challenge. PC/Mac: August 13, 2018

Console: August 28, 2018 Murkmire 2,000 Murkmire Arena: Blackrose Prison Travel to Murkmire, the southernmost region of mysterious Black Marsh, and venture into the deep swamps to learn some of the most hidden secrets of the Argonians! PC/Mac: October 22, 2018

Console: November 6, 2018 Story arc: Season of the Dragon Wrathstone 1,500 Dungeons: Depths of Malatar, Frostvault Uncover Tamriel's buried secrets and begin the Season of the Dragon in Wrathstone. Explore mysterious ruins, face challenging bosses, and claim their riches and knowledge for yourself in two innovative new dungeons: Frostvault and Depths of Malatar. PC/Mac: February 25, 2019

Console: March 12, 2019 Elsweyr 3,500 Northern Elsweyr Trial: Sunspire Class: Necromancer Venture to the land of the Khajiit in Elsweyr. Face dread creatures from the past—Dragons!—as you join with new friends and old enemies to save Elsweyr from war and devastation. As Chapter: June 4, 2019

As DLC (PC/Mac): May 26, 2020

As DLC (Console): June 10, 2020 Scalebreaker 1,500 Dungeons: Moongrave Fane, Lair of Maarselok The Season of the Dragon continues with two Dragon-themed dungeons: Moongrave Fane and Lair of Maarselok. Delve into these deadly new four-player dungeons and encounter challenging boss fights and amazing stories that expand upon the year-long adventure! PC/Mac: August 12, 2019

Console: August 27, 2019 Dragonhold 2,000 Southern Elsweyr The Season of the Dragon saga concludes with Dragonhold. Defend the people of Southern Elsweyr, restore the ancient Dragonguard order, and fight back against the Dragon menace. Your year-long adventure comes to its exciting finale here! PC/Mac: October 21, 2019

Console: November 5, 2019 Story arc: Dark Heart of Skyrim Harrowstorm 1,500 Dungeons: Icereach, Unhallowed Grave Begin your Dark Heart of Skyrim adventure with two exciting new Dungeons: Icereach and Unhallowed Grave. Venture to a storm-cursed island and unholy burial ground, battle cunning witches and vile necromancers, and experience an all-new story! PC/Mac: February 24, 2020

Console: March 10, 2020 Greymoor 3,500 Western Skyrim

Blackreach: Greymoor Caverns Trial: Kyne's Aegis Antiquities To the heroes of Tamriel! Jorunn the Skald-King has dispatched agents to Western Skyrim to investigate and deal with a threat not only to Skyrim, but to all of Tamriel. Find the Skald-King's agent in Solitude, the capital city of Haafingar Hold. As Chapter (PC/Mac): May 26, 2020

As Chapter (Console): June 10, 2020

As DLC (PC/Mac): June 1, 2021

As DLC (Console): June 8, 2021 Stonethorn 1,500 Dungeons: Stone Garden, Castle Thorn Delve into the Dark Heart of Skyrim and continue your year-long adventure in Stonethorn. Confront a rising threat and uncover a monstrous secret with two challenging dungeons: Castle Thorn and Stone Garden. PC/Mac: August 24, 2020

Console: September 1, 2020 Markarth 2,000 The Reach

Blackreach: Arkthzand Cavern Arena: Vateshran Hollows(solo) The Dark Heart of Skyrim epic concludes in Markarth. As the Gray Host marches on the Reach, find unlikely allies among the clans that call this wild region home and unveil the true motivations of the mysterious Vampire Lord, Rada al-Saran. PC/Mac: November 2, 2020

Console: November 9, 2020 Story arc: Gates of Oblivion Flames of Ambition 1,500 Dungeons: The Cauldron, Black Drake Villa The Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure begins with Flames of Ambition. Delve into two new dungeons, Black Drake Villa and the Cauldron, that set up the events of the Blackwood Chapter and lead you on the path of ruin and destruction. PC/Mac: March 8, 2021

Console: March 16, 2021 Blackwood 3,500 Blackwood Trial: Rockgrove Companions A call to arms! The Chamber of Legates in Leyawiin needs help to investigate a threat against former Imperial councilors and the activities of a Mehrunes Dagon cult. Seek the leader of the Ivory Brigade in Leyawiin, the capital of Blackwood. As Chapter (PC/Mac): June 1, 2021

As Chapter (Console): June 8, 2021

As DLC (PC/Mac): June 6, 2022

As DLC (Console): June 21, 2022 Waking Flame 1,500 Dungeons: The Dread Cellar, Red Petal Bastion Continue the battle against Mehrunes Dagon in the next installment of the Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure: Waking Flame. Uncover his plans in Red Petal Bastion and the Dread Cellar, foreshadowing the apocalyptic conclusion of the Deadlands DLC. PC/Mac: August 23, 2021

Console: September 8, 2021 The Deadlands 2,000 Fargrave

The Deadlands From hidden locations in the Deadlands, the Waking Flame seeks to destroy multiple realms—including Nirn—to please Mehrunes Dagon. Struggle to avert disaster alongside familiar allies and new friends in the epic conclusion to the Gates of Oblivion. PC/Mac: November 1, 2021

Console: November 16, 2021 Story arc: Legacy of the Bretons Ascending Tide 1,500 Dungeons: Coral Aerie, Shipwright's Regret The Legacy of the Bretons year-long story starts here! Strange things are happening in the Coral Aerie and Shipwright's Regret as old rivalries, ancient history, and the birthright of the Bretons come into focus and lead to the upcoming High Isle Chapter. PC/Mac: March 14, 2022

Console: March 29, 2022 High Isle 3,500 High Isle Trial: Dreadsail Reef Tales of Tribute Welcome to High Isle, a part of Tamriel never-before-seen in the Elder Scrolls. Explore the Breton's idyllic seat of power and noble chivalric culture as you confront the forces of the Ascendant Lord who threaten to plunge Tamriel into endless conflict. As Chapter (PC/Mac): June 6, 2022

As Chapter (Console): June 21, 2022

As DLC (PC/Mac): June 5, 2023

As DLC (Console): June 20, 2023 Lost Depths 1,500 Dungeons: Earthen Root Enclave, Graven Deep Out at sea or in the heart of a druid grove, the Legacy of the Bretons year-long story sails on! An ancient enemy rises to threaten the peace of Earthen Root Enclave, and dark storms erupt from Graven Deep. The earth trembles before the next DLC! PC/Mac: August 22, 2022

Console: September 6, 2022 Firesong 2,000 Galen Set sail for Galen as the Legacy of the Bretons year-long story comes to a close! A druid civil war erupts and followers of the True Way vie for the legacy of the Druid King. Unite with new allies to make the Systres safe once and for all. PC/Mac: November 1, 2022

Console: November 15, 2022 Story arc: Shadow Over Morrowind Scribes of Fate 1,500 Dungeons: Bal Sunnar, Scrivener's Hall SHADOW OVER MORROWIND: Delve into the mysteries of Hermaeus Mora and begin a story that continues into the Necrom Chapter. What forbidden secrets will you uncover? PC/Mac: March 13, 2023

Console: March 28, 2023 Necrom 3,500 Telvanni Peninsula

Apocrypha Trial: Sanity's Edge Class: Arcanist What truths are best left hidden? Discover Necrom and the forbidden secrets of Apocrypha. From the Telvanni Peninsula in Eastern Morrowind to the cosmic realms of the Prince of Fate - fight to uphold reality and unlock the runic power of a new Class – the Arcanist! As Chapter (PC/Mac): June 5, 2023

As Chapter (Console): June 20, 2023

As DLC (PC/Mac): June 3, 2024

As DLC (Console): June 18, 2024 Scions of Ithelia 1,500 Dungeons: Bedlam Veil, Oathsworn Pit PC/Mac: March 11, 2024

Console: March 26, 2024

Collector's Edition Bundles

Most DLCs launch with their own "Collector's Edition" bundle. These bundles last for one update cycle, and are retired following the release of the next major update or DLC pack. Some have been made available again temporarily during anniversary events.

Imperial City Collector's Bundle

Get Cyrodilic with your personal Mind-Shriven Skin, a Mind-Shriven Horse to ride, a creepy Daedrat pet, and the mighty Imperial City DLC!

The Imperial City Collector's Bundle was first available during the Planemeld Palpitation event, held on the first anniversary of the DLC's release from August 29 to September 7, 2016 (it was not available during the DLC's initial release quarter). The bundle included the Imperial City DLC, a Daedrat pet, the Mind-Shriven Horse mount, the Mind-Shriven Skin, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 055005,500 .

It was made available again for the second anniversary of its release, as part of the Imperial City Anniversary event (September 7, 2017 to September 18, 2017), at a discounted price of 033003,300 .

Orsinium Collector's Bundle

Take home the Orsinium DLC along with a Cave Bear Mount and her Cub, plus 5 Experience Scrolls!

Originally released as the Orsinium DLC Collector's Edition for 050005,000 alongside Orsinium, this bundle was retired following the launch of Thieves Guild but was available again for a limited time during the Orsinium One-Year Anniversary event as the Orsinium Collector's Bundle for 020002,000 . The bundle included the Orsinium DLC, the Cave Bear mount, Cave Bear Cub pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls.

Thieves Guild Collector's Edition

Get the Thieves Guild DLC plus bonuses: the Hammerfell Camel mount, the Kindlespit Dragon Frog pet, and 5 Experience Scrolls - all for a bargain price!

The Thieves Guild Collector's Edition was released alongside Thieves Guild for 040004,000 , and retired following the launch of Dark Brotherhood. It was available again for a limited time as the Thieves Guild Collector's Bundle during the Thieves Guild Anniversary event for 020002,000 . The bundle included the Thieves Guild DLC, the Hammerfell Camel mount, Kindlespit Dragon Frog pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls.

Dark Brotherhood Collector's Edition

Now, for a discount price, get the Dark Brotherhood DLC plus the Highland Wolf mount, the Sylvan Nixad pet, and five Experience Scrolls!

The Dark Brotherhood Collector's Edition was released alongside Dark Brotherhood and retired following the launch of Shadows of the Hist. The bundle included the Dark Brotherhood DLC, the Highland Wolf mount, Sylvan Nixad pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Shadows of the Hist Collector's Bundle

Includes two dungeons, Cradle of Shadows and Ruins of Mazzatun, plus the Hist Guar mount, Haj Mota Hatchling pet, and 5 XP scrolls.

The Shadows of the Hist Collector's Bundle was released alongside Shadows of the Hist and retired following the launch of One Tamriel. The bundle included the Shadows of the Hist DLC, the Hist Guar mount, Haj Mota Hatchling pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 025002,500 .

Horns of the Reach Collector's Bundle

Take home the Horns of the Reach dungeon DLC and get bonus access to the Karthwolf Charger mount, Karthwolf Shepherd pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls.

The Horns of the Reach Collector's Bundle was released alongside Horns of the Reach and retired with the launch of the Clockwork City DLC. The bundle included the Horns of the Reach DLC, the Karthwolf Charger mount, Karthwolf Shepherd pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 035003,500 .

Clockwork City Collector's Bundle

Includes the Clockwork City DLC, as well as a new Skeevaton pet, the Kagouti Fabricant mount, and Crown Experience Scrolls.

The Clockwork City Collector's Bundle was released alongside The Clockwork City and retired with the launch of Dragon Bones. The bundle included The Clockwork City DLC, the Kagouti Fabricant mount, Skeevaton pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Dragon Bones Collector's Bundle

In addition to the Fang Lair and Scalecaller Peak Dungeons, this bundle includes the exclusive Fang Lair Horse, the Small Bone Dragon Construct pet, and a stack of Experience Scrolls.

The Dragon Bones Collector's Bundle was released alongside Dragon Bones and was retired when Morrowind became available in the Crown Store. The bundle included the Dragon Bones DLC, the Fang Lair Courser mount, Small Bone Dragon Construct pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Morrowind Collector's Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Morrowind Digital Collector's Edition, as well as the Morrowind pre-order digital items. Does not include the Morrowind DLC.

The Morrowind Collector's Pack was released alongside the Summerset chapter and is still available to purchase in the Crown Store. The bundle does not include Morrowind or the Warden class, but only the collectibles: Slate-Gray Summoned Bear skill mod, Dwarven War Horse mount, Dwarven War Dog and Dwarven Spider pets, Austere Warden costume, Morag Tong outfit style, PvP Taunts emote pack (Kiss This, Tea Time, Belly Laugh, and Go Quietly), 3 Vvardenfell CE Treasure Maps, 2 Experience Scrolls, and a single Dwarven Crown Crate. It originally cost 035003,500 but was reduced to 021002,100 by May 2020.

Wolfhunter Collector's Bundle

Take down those afflicted with the lycanthropic curse and come face-to-face with the Daedric Prince Hircine in Moon Hunter Keep and March of Sacrifices. Includes the exclusive Silver Dawn Argent Charger Mount, the noble Silver Daenian Werewolf Tracker, and more.

The Wolfhunter Collector's Bundle was released alongside Wolfhunter and was retired with the release of Murkmire. The bundle included the Wolfhunter DLC, the Silver Dawn Argent Charger mount, Silver Daenian Werewolf Tracker pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and costs 040004,000 .

Murkmire Collector's Bundle

Travel to Murkmire, the southernmost region of mysterious Black Marsh, and venture into the deep swamps to learn some of the hidden secrets of the Argonians! Includes the Shellback Warhorse, Cantaloupe Swamp Jelly pet, and a stack of Experience Scrolls.

The Murkmire Collector's Bundle was released alongside Murkmire and retired with the release of Wrathstone. This bundle included the Murkmire DLC, the Shellback Warhorse mount, the Cantaloupe Swamp Jelly pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Wrathstone Collector's Bundle

The Season of the Dragon has begun! Face ancient Dwarven automatons in Frostvault and discover the fate of a lost Imperial legion in Depths of Malatar. Includes the exclusive Treasure Hunter's Horse Mount, Carnelian Theodolite Pet, and more.

The Wrathstone Collector's Bundle was released alongside Wrathstone. The collector's bundle includes the Wrathstone DLC, the Treasure Hunter's Horse mount, the Carnelian Theodolite pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Summerset Collector's Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Summerset Digital Collector's Edition, as well as the Summerset pre-order digital items. Does not include the Nightmare Senche mount or Summerset DLC.

The Summerset Collector's Pack was released alongside the Elsweyr chapter. This pack includes the Divine Prosecution outfit style, Bloodshadow Wraith Steed mount, Fledgling Gryphon pet, Psijic Scrying Talisman memento, House of Reveries emote pack (Happy Face, Sad Face, and Ta-Dah! emotes), Court of Bedlam costume, Pocket Salamander pet, 1 Psijic Vault Crate, 3 Summerset CE Treasure Maps, and 2 Experience Scrolls. It costs 021002,100 .

Scalebreaker Collector's Bundle

Continue your Season of the Dragon adventure with Scalebreaker and its two Dragon-themed dungeons: Moongrave Fane and Lair of Maarselok. Includes the exclusive Ancient Dragon Hunter Horse Mount, Ancient Dragon Hunter Wolf Pet, and more!

The Scalebreaker Collector's Bundle was released alongside Scalebreaker. The collector's bundle includes the Scalebreaker DLC, the Ancient Dragon Hunter Horse mount, the Ancient Dragon Hunter Wolf pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Dragonhold Collector's Bundle

Defend the people of Southern Elsweyr, restore the ancient Dragonguard order, and fight back against the Dragon menace. Includes the Legendary Dragon Mount and Pet, and a pack of Experience Scrolls.

The Dragonhold Collector's Bundle was released alongside Dragonhold and retired with the release of Harrowstorm. This bundle included the Dragonhold DLC, the Legendary Dragon Horse mount, the Legendary Dragon Wolf pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Harrowstorm Collector's Bundle

Begin your Dark Heart of Skyrim year-long adventure with Harrowstorm and two new dungeons: Icereach and Unhallowed Grave. Includes the DLC game pack and exclusive Hallin's Jackal Pet, Pyre Watch Jackal Mount, and more!

The Harrowstorm Collector's Bundle was released alongside Harrowstorm. This bundle included the Harrowstorm DLC, the Pyre Watch Jackal mount, the Hallin's Jackal pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Elsweyr Collector's Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Elsweyr Digital Collector's Edition, as well as the Elsweyr pre-order digital items. This does not include the Rahd-m'Athra mount or Elsweyr DLC.

The Elsweyr Collector's Pack was released in August following the Greymoor chapter. This pack includes the Dragonbone outfit style, Senche-raht mount, Ashen Scar Jerboa pet, Archaic Lore Tablets memento, Khajiiti Cultural emote pack (Cat Contemplation, Feline Hygiene, and Pedlar Beckoning emotes), Noble Clan-Chief costume, Blue Dragon Imp pet, 1 Baandari Pedlar Crate, 3 Elsweyr CE Treasure Maps, and 2 Experience Scrolls. It costs 021002,100 .

Stonethorn Collector's Bundle

Continue your Dark Heart of Skyrim year-long adventure with Stonethorn and two new dungeons: Stone Garden and Castle Thorn. Includes the DLC game pack and exclusive Snowsnarl Durzog Pet, Frostborn Durzog Mangler Mount, and more!

The Stonethorn Collector's Bundle was released alongside Stonethorn. The collector's bundle includes the Stonethorn DLC, the Frostborn Durzog Mangler mount, the Snowsnarl Durzog pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Markarth Collector's Bundle

Fight alongside Reach clans, uncover ancient Dwarven secrets, and battle the Gray Host army that threatens to consume the world. Includes the Chaurus Egg Chaser's Horse mount, Teacup Chaurus Chitterling pet, and a pack of experience scrolls.

The Markarth Collector's Bundle was released alongside Markarth. The collector's bundle includes the Markarth DLC, the Chaurus Egg Chaser's Horse mount, the Teacup Chaurus Chitterling pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Flames of Ambition Collector's Bundle

Begin your Gates of Oblivion adventure with Flames of Ambition and two new dungeons: Black Drake Villa and the Cauldron. Includes the DLC game pack, Falinesti's Faithful Totem Elk mount, the Clearspring Striped Fawn pet, and more!

The Flames of Ambition Collector's Bundle was released alongside Flames of Ambition. This bundle included the Flames of Ambition DLC, the Falinesti's Faithful Totem Elk mount, the Clearspring Striped Fawn pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Greymoor Collector's Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Greymoor Digital Collector's Edition, as well as the Greymoor pre-order digital items. This does not include the Holdbreaker Warhorse mount or Greymoor DLC.

The Greymoor Collector's Pack was released alongside the Blackwood chapter. This pack includes the Swordthane outfit style, Crypt Warden Death Hound mount, Death Hound pet, Orb of Magnus memento, Skyrim emote pack (Arrow to the Knee, Missing Sweetroll, and Ragnar the Red emotes), Jarl Finery costume, Jarl Crown major adornment, Sacrificial Pocket Mammoth pet, 1 Nightfall Preview Crate, 3 Western Skyrim CE Treasure Maps, and 2 Experience Scrolls. It costs 021002,100 .

Waking Flame Collector's Bundle

Continue your Gates of Oblivion adventure with Waking Flame and two new dungeons: Red Petal Bastion and the Dread Cellar. Includes the DLC game pack, Silver Rose Senche-Serval mount, the Ironclad Senche-Serval Kitten pet, and more!

The Waking Flame Collector's Bundle was released alongside Waking Flame. This bundle included the Waking Flame DLC, the Silver Rose Senche-Serval mount, the Ironclad Senche-Serval Kitten pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

The Deadlands Collector's Bundle

Team up with a clan of free Dremora, uncover the true secret of the Longhouse Emperors, and battle the forces of the Waking Flame to seal the Gates of Oblivion. Includes the DLC game pack, Nightmare Bear mount, the Deadlands Bantam Guar pet, and more!

The Deadlands Collector's Bundle was released alongside The Deadlands. The collector's bundle includes The Deadlands DLC, the Nightmare Bear mount, the Deadlands Bantam Guar pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Ascending Tide Collector's Bundle

Begin your Legacy of the Bretons adventure with Ascending Tide and two new dungeons: Coral Aerie and Shipwright's Regret. Includes the DLC game pack, Dreadsail Howler mount, the Iliac Bay Crab pet, and more!

The Ascending Tide Collector's Bundle was released alongside Ascending Tide. This bundle included the Ascending Tide DLC, the Dreadsail Howler mount, the Iliac Bay Crab pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Blackwood Collector's Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Blackwood Digital Collector's Edition, as well as the Blackwood pre-order digital items. Does not include the Nagahide Welwa Ravager mount or Blackwood DLC.

The Blackwood Collector's Pack was released alongside the High Isle chapter. This pack includes the Deadlands Gladiator outfit style, Battlefield Nightmare Senche mount, Jewel-Feathered Sep Adder pet, Temporal Grimoire memento, Offer Weapon emote, Dremora Kynreeve outfit style, Deadlands Wamasu pet, 1 Iron Atronach Crate, 3 Blackwood CE Treasure Maps, and 2 Experience Scrolls. It costs 021002,100 .

Lost Depths Collector's Bundle

Continue your Legacy of the Bretons adventure with the Lost Depths DLC and two new dungeons: Earthen Root Enclave and Graven Deep. Includes the DLC game pack, Turquoise War Pangrit mount, the Pangrit Nymphling pet, and more!

The Lost Depths Collector's Bundle was released alongside Lost Depths. This bundle included the Lost Depths DLC, the Turquoise War Pangrit mount, the Pangrit Nymphling pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Firesong Collector's Bundle

Ally with the scion of House Mornard, end a war between the druid circles, and make safe the legacy of the ancient Druid King. Includes the DLC game pack, Cinderstone Kagouti mount, the Companion's Wolf Pup pet, and more!

The Firesong Collector's Bundle was released alongside Firesong. This bundle included the Firesong DLC, Cinderstone Kagouti mount, the Companion's Wolf Pup pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and cost 040004,000 .

Scribes of Fate Collector's Bundle

Begin the Shadow over Morrowind storyline with the Scribes of Fate DLC and two new dungeons: Bal Sunnar and Scrivener's Hall. Includes the DLC game pack, Antecedent Scholar's Guar mount, the Blightlord's Skeever pet, and more!

Scribes of Fate Collector's Bundle was released alongside Scribes of Fate on March 13, 2023 for PC and March 28, 2023 for consoles.[1]. The collector's bundle includes The Scribes of Fate DLC, the Antecedent Scholar's Guar mount, the Blightlord's Skeever pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls, and 035003,500 .

High Isle Collector's Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the High Isle Digital Collector's Edition, as well as the High Isle pre-order digital items. Does not include the Palefrost Elk mount or High Isle DLC.

The High Isle Collector's Pack was made available after the launch of the Necrom chapter for consoles. This pack includes the Ascendant Knight outfit style, Amenos Ornaug mount, Balfiera Senche Cub pet, Hoard of the Schemers memento, High Isle emote pack (Air the Heir, Elite Seat, and Wait the Great emotes), Abecean Privateer's Apparel costume, Knights of the Flame Pup pet, 1 Dark Chivalry Crate, 3 High Isle CE Treasure Maps, and 2 Experience Scrolls. It costs 021002,100 .

Scions of Ithelia Collector's Pack

Tackle two new dungeons with ties to Oblivion: Oathsworn Pit and Bedlam Veil. Includes the DLC game pack, Ashbone Sabre Cat mount, Ashbone Echalette pet, and more!

The Scions of Ithelia Collector's Pack was made available immediately after the launch of the DLC itself for PC. The collector's bundle includes The Scions of Ithelia DLC, the Ashbone Sabre Cat mount, the Ashbone Echalette pet, and five Crown Experience Scrolls. It costs 035003,500 , and was available free to ESO Plus users for a two-week period following its launch.

Necrom Deluxe Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Necrom Deluxe Edition, as well as the Necrom pre-purchase digital items. Does not include the Sadrith Mora Spore Steed mount or Necrom DLC.

The Necrom Deluxe Pack was made available after the launch of the Gold Road chapter for PC/Mac. This pack includes the Knowledge Eater outfit style, Hermitage Servitor mount, Cipher's Eye Pocket Watcher pet, Dark Lady's Headrest memento, Scholarly emote pack (Leaning Scholar, Sitting Scholar, and Standing Scholar emotes), Sadrith Mora Formal Attire costume, Apocryphal Bookwyrm pet, 1 Unfeathered Crate, 3 Necrom CE Treasure Maps, and 2 Experience Scrolls. It costs 021002,100 .

Future Content

As shown in the roadmap for 2024, the content cadence will be as follows:

Q1: Scions of Ithelia Dungeon DLC.

Q2: Gold Road Chapter.

Q3: Base game update featuring quality-of-Life improvements, bug fixes and new Housing features.

Q4: An update featuring two new Companions and a PvP-related feature.
